A

AndroidNfcPlugin - Interface in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc
Provides the public elements used to manage the Android NFC plugin. It defines in particular the type of object produced by the {@link AndroidNfcPluginFactory} and allow to set parameters to retrieve the communication mode from the name of a reader.
AndroidNfcPlugin.Companion - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc
 
AndroidNfcPluginFactory - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc
Provides a factory to get the {@link AndroidNfcPlugin}.
AndroidNfcPluginFactory(activity, readerObservationExceptionHandler) - Constructor for class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcPluginFactory
Provides a factory to get the {@link AndroidNfcPlugin}.
AndroidNfcProtocolSettings - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc
This class contains all the parameters to identify the communication protocols supported by NFC readers.
AndroidNfcReader - Interface in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc
Reader to communicate with NFC Tag though Android NfcAdapter
AndroidNfcReader.Companion - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc
 
AndroidNfcSupportedProtocols - Enum in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc
List of protocols supported by this plugin

getNoPlateformSound() - Method in interface org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader
Allows the invoker to prevent the platform from playing sounds when it discovers a tag.
getPlugin() - Method in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcPluginFactory
Returns an instance of the {@link AndroidNfcPlugin} if the platform is ready
getPLUGIN_NAME() - Method in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader.Companion

{@inheritDoc}
getPresenceCheckDelay() - Method in interface org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader
Allows the calling application to specify the delay that the platform will use for performing presence checks on any discovered tag. see @NfcAdapter.EXTRA_READER_PRESENCE_CHECK_DELAY
getREADER_NAME() - Method in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader.Companion
 
getSetting(cardProtocol) - Method in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcProtocolSettings
Associates a protocol and a string defining how to identify it (here a regex to be applied on the ATR)
getSkipNdefCheck() - Method in interface org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader
Prevent the platform from performing any NDEF checks in reader mode.
getSpecificSettings(specificProtocols) - Method in class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcProtocolSettings
Return a subset of the settings map

printTagId() - Method in interface org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader
Gets a string describing the low level description of the current tag.
processIntent(intent) - Method in interface org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader
Process data from NFC Intent. Can be use to handle NFC Tag received when app is started by nfc detection

S

setNoPlateformSound(p) - Method in interface org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader
Allows the invoker to prevent the platform from playing sounds when it discovers a tag.
